title: Introduction of the first commercial biobased benzoxazines for the manufacturing of fibre reinforced polymers
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00192C, Paper
Open Access

Gideon Abels, Katharina Koschek, Paul Jones, Wendy Howarth
This paper introduces the first commercial biobased benzoxazine resins and shows their promising flame-retardant properties based on intumescence.
